general.name: iOS - ITSS - COVID - Single App Mode - Teams
general.payloads: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd"> <plist version="1"><dict><key>PayloadUUID</key><string>E707DA0B-C55C-47C4-8A87-56C56C61DFF1</string><key>PayloadType</key><string>Configuration</string><key>PayloadOrganization</key><string>Arizona Western College</string><key>PayloadIdentifier</key><string>E707DA0B-C55C-47C4-8A87-56C56C61DFF1</string><key>PayloadDisplayName</key><string>iOS - ITSS - COVID - Single App Mode - Teams</string><key>PayloadDescription</key><string>Restrictions Profile for the iOS 12 STIG V1R2. Allows unrestricted use of Touch ID and Face ID. Assumes AO has approved unrestricted use of unmanaged apps. Created 4 September 2018.</string><key>PayloadVersion</key><integer>1</integer><key>PayloadEnabled</key><true/><key>HasRemovalPasscode</key><false/><key>PayloadRemovalDisallowed</key><true/><key>PayloadContent</key><array><dict><key>PayloadUUID</key><string>674B99E9-A2DF-41B2-BF8B-3B254A83BF4F</string><key>PayloadType</key><string>com.apple.app.lock</string><key>PayloadOrganization</key><string>Arizona Western College</string><key>PayloadIdentifier</key><string>674B99E9-A2DF-41B2-BF8B-3B254A83BF4F</string><key>PayloadDisplayName</key><string>com.apple.app.lock</string><key>PayloadDescription</key><string/><key>PayloadVersion</key><integer>1</integer><key>PayloadEnabled</key><true/><key>App</key><dict><key>Identifier</key><string>com.microsoft.skype.teams</string><key>Options</key><dict><key>DisableDeviceRotation</key><false/><key>DisableVolumeButtons</key><false/><key>EnableVoiceControl</key><false/><key>DisableAutoLock</key><true/><key>EnableSpeakSelection</key><false/><key>DisableRingerSwitch</key><false/><key>EnableInvertColors</key><false/><key>EnableMonoAudio</key><false/><key>EnableAssistiveTouch</key><false/><key>EnableZoom</key><false/><key>EnableVoiceOver</key><false/><key>DisableTouch</key><false/><key>DisableSleepWakeButton</key><false/><key>VoiceControl</key><false/></dict><key>UserEnabledOptions</key><dict><key>VoiceOver</key><false/><key>InvertColors</key><false/><key>Zoom</key><false/><key>AssistiveTouch</key><false/><key>VoiceControl</key><false/></dict></dict></dict></array></dict></plist>
